name: MaoMao Castle: A Magical Cat-Dragon Fantasy Adventure
name_original: MaoMao Castle: A Magical Cat-Dragon Fantasy Adventure
description:
Help your MaoMao, a magical flying Cat-Dragon, on a fantastical journey to free your friends. Head back to their castle, collect rainbows and avoid obstacles along the way.
Perform the speed dash to crash through trees, pillars and moai, as you try not to lose your 9 lives.

Early Access 0.5.0

Thanks for trying  MaoMao Castle: A Magical Cat-Dragon Fantasy Adventure Early Access. It’s been 3 years 7 months of our spare time, with 66 event showcases.
Planned additions:
😻 More hand crafted waves
😻 Different MaoMao Cat-Dragon skins
😻 Exciting MaoMao Rescue waves
😻 Global online scores
😻 Hype announcers
😻 Karma cats
😻😻😻 and more!!! 😻😻😻

-= Scoring =-
1000 points - Rainbows
500 points - Columns/Trees
100 points - Plants, Pebbles, Crystals
10 points - each step running on the ground

100 bonus points - rainbows on completion
5000 bonus points - each remaining life on completion

50 Rainbows = Extra life

-= Controls =-
Mouse to move
Mouse click / Spacebar to Speed Dash

Titles Screen options
ALT+S - Scanlines
0 - Full Screen
1 - Window mode 320x200
2 - 2x Window mode 640x400
3 - 3x Window mode 960x600
4 - 4x Window mode 1280x800

ESC - Quit
